Class AppointmentManager

java.lang.Object
AppointmentManagement.AppointmentManager
public class AppointmentManager extends Object
Manages all appointment-related operations including scheduling, updating, and retrieving appointments.

    • doctors

      private Map<String,Doctor> doctors

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentManager

      public AppointmentManager(Map<String,Doctor> doctors)
      Constructor to initialize the AppointmentManager with a map of doctors.
      Parameters:
      doctors - A map containing Doctor objects with their IDs as keys.

  • Method Details

    • getAppointments

      public Map<String,Appointment> getAppointments()
      Retrieves the current map of appointments.
      Returns:
      A map of appointment IDs to Appointment objects.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public Appointment scheduleAppointment(String appointmentID, int patientID, String doctorID, LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Schedules a new appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - Unique identifier for the appointment.
      patientID - Unique identifier for the patient.
      doctorID - Unique identifier for the doctor.
      date - Date of the appointment.
      time - Time of the appointment.
      Returns:
      The newly created Appointment object or null if the slot is unavailable.

    • updateAppointmentInFile

      public void updateAppointmentInFile(Appointment appointment)
      Updates an existing appointment in the file.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The Appointment object with updated details.

    • removeAppointmentFromFile

      public void removeAppointmentFromFile(String appointmentID)
      Removes an appointment from the file based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to remove.

    • updateStatusInFile

      public void updateStatusInFile(String appointmentID, String newStatus)
      Updates the status of an appointment and handles associated slot availability.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to update.
      newStatus - The new status to set (e.g., "Confirmed", "Cancelled").

    • setSlotUnavailable

      public void setSlotUnavailable(String doctorID, LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Sets a specific time slot as unavailable for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      date - The date of the slot.
      time - The start time of the slot.

    • removeUnavailableSlot

      public void removeUnavailableSlot(String doctorID, LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Removes a time slot's unavailability status for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      date - The date of the slot.
      time - The start time of the slot.

    • reloadAppointments

      public void reloadAppointments()
      Reloads all appointments from the appointments file into memory.

    • getUpcomingAppointmentsByDoctor

      public List<Appointment> getUpcomingAppointmentsByDoctor(String doctorID)
      Retrieves a list of upcoming appointments for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      Returns:
      A list of upcoming Appointment objects.

    • updatePrescriptionStatus

      public void updatePrescriptionStatus(String appointmentID, String newStatus)
      Updates the prescription status of a specific appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment.
      newStatus - The new prescription status to set.

    • getAppointmentsByPatientID

      public List<Appointment> getAppointmentsByPatientID(int patientID)
      Retrieves a list of appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects associated with the patient.

    • getAppointmentsByDoctorID

      public List<Appointment> getAppointmentsByDoctorID(String doctorID)
      Retrieves a list of appointments for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects associated with the doctor.

    • isTimeSlotAvailable

      public boolean isTimeSlotAvailable(String doctorID, LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Checks if a specific time slot is available for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      date - The date of the appointment.
      time - The time of the appointment.
      Returns:
      True if the time slot is available; otherwise, false.
